brand.name: Ipanema
brand.ethicalInfo1: Ipanema does not communicate sufficient information about its environmental policies
brand.ethicalInfo2:
Ipanema's environment rating is 'very poor'. It does not publish sufficient relevant information about its environmental policies to give a higher rating. As a shopper you have the right to know how its production practices impact on the environment.

Its labour rating is 'not good enough'. There is no evidence of a Code of Conduct. It sources its final stage of production from countries with high risk of labour abuse. It does not mention payment of a living wage. It traces some of its supply chain.

Its animal rating is 'good'. There is no evidence that it uses animal products but does not mention being vegan.

Ipanema is rated 'Not good enough' based on information from our own research.
brand.positiveText: Dear Ipanema, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Ipanema, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
